Bobby tells them no PDA at work and it's essentially a one shot about excuses they come up with to sneak in a little affection.I know there's many fics like this. One part I remember is Bobby telling them they can't do anything in the station and buck asks if it's OK for them to kiss in the fire truck outside the station.If anyone knows this fic, let me know.

entry.title: Growing Pains
entry.summary:
Author: TheCaptain42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,937Chapters: 11/14Kudos: 163

Summary: Chris and Eddie are still working to regain trust. Chris isn't ready to come home yet. But he calls his dad with big news.*“Dad…”, Chris sighed, “Izzy’s my boyfriend.”*---Chris comes out as bi while in Texas. In the aftermath Eddie finally reflects his own past and future relationships. Maybe it's finally time to open the lid to the box of trauma Eddie had previously tidied so neatly away. Maybe it's time to reckon with the loss of Shannon, with his childhood in El Paso and why nothing ever quite works out for him. Buck is nothing but helpful of course. It's the year of gay awakenings.----(Mostly) Canon Compliant until season 8 ep 08 (though distinct lack of bees due to work-life balance) - this is a fic accompanying Eddie's character development in season 8

entry.title: that something lovers call fate
entry.summary:
Author: theramblingwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,374Chapters: 5/17Kudos: 14

Summary: Buck and Eddie first meet in 2016 when Eddie needs a partner to drive with him and his son from El Paso to LA where he's moving to be with his girlfriend and start a new life with the LAFD.He doesn't think he and Buck are destined to be friends. They probably won't think about each other again.Two years later Buck and Eddie run into each other when Eddie is at a cafe with his wife.Buck wonders if this is the universe giving them a second chance to get to know each other. Neither of them take it.Three more years pass by before they meet again.Eddie transfers to the 118 after his divorce, and Buck's still mourning an unexpected breakup with his girlfriend… but this time, things just seem to click.

entry.title: What We Leave Behind
entry.summary:
Author: le_medusa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,199Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 9

Summary: After four months in El Paso, Eddie begins to question his decision to stay. Christopher keeps asking when they will return to Los Angeles. Meanwhile, communication with Buck has become sparse, and Eddie tells himself it’s just because they’re both busy.That belief starts to crack when Buck calls him one night, full of excitement about a new firefighter at the 118—Tobias Evers, a single father looking for a fresh start. Buck talks about how well Tobias is fitting in, how skilled he is, and even mentions planning a climbing trip with him. Eddie tries to brush it off, but the more Buck talks, the more he realizes how much has changed in his absence.For months, Eddie had convinced himself that things would stay the same, that when he returned, everything would fall back into place. But now, with Buck seemingly doing better without him, Eddie starts to wonder if the life he left behind is still waiting for him—or if he’s already been replaced.

entry.title: A Prehistoric Connection
entry.summary:
Author: kenziebc4289

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,309Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Okay so basically, @/eightpackdiaz (twitter) had a HC of buck cold calling people to talk about dinosaurs like the kid in Mitchells vs. the Machines. Except their idea was them calling only during the summer when Eddie is at his Abuela's house. My take/change is that Isabel lives in El Paso until Eddie gets to high school and him and Buck stay connect throughout the year. Anyway, this is a little AU about Buck and Eddie growing up together on the phone but also growing apart, bc life. Additionally, @/diazseresin (twitter) is writing this AU as well, so read that when it's done too! I fear I have no following on the bird app, so nobody pays any mind to me lol. Also this is only my second published fic, and my first multi-chapter fic, so please be nice. Anyway, hope you enjoy.

entry.title: Worth So Much More (After I'm a Goner)
entry.summary:
Author: UnAmusings

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,118Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 71

Summary: Curling in on himself, Buck coughs in earnest, hacking violently enough that he tastes bits of copper on his tongue. Eyes watering, struggling to breathe, Buck shifts to his hands and knees. The vials roll away, leaving him with a free hand to pound against his sternum. The sensation of something crawling up his neck, choking him, has panic setting in until it’s finally free. Something plops onto the floor with an unsettling wetness. Looking down, he sees a full grown string of honeysuckle, roots and all, tainted with splatters of blood in the silvery moonlight. Its nectar still lingers on his lips, sugary, delicate, ominous. The message is clear. Buck leans his forehead on the floor, and screams. Even knowing this love would eventually kill him, for Eddie, he’ll let it. ✽⊱ 🎕 ⊰✽ Buck's looking death down the barrel, yet again, this time in the form of Hanahaki. Eddie's leaving for Texas, Maddie's struggling in the aftermath of being kidnapped, Bobby has yet another specter of his past coming to haunt him. Buck will let himself strangle on the blossoms of his own unspoken love rather than ruin what little he has left.

entry.title: this is our place (we make the rules)
entry.summary:
Author: sunriseandsunshine

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,525Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Eddie should be excited… right? He’s getting his son back. That’s what matters. But his stomach is filled with a pit the size of Jupiter as he thinks about Buck. Because he wasn’t lying when he told Buck he mattered to him.Christopher is getting older by the day. He can’t blame Buck for being upset he's leaving, but he also can’t handle missing any more of his son’s childhood. His son already lost one parent and to not at least try to be there would be a disservice to him. But he’d rather be bringing his son home than packing up his life and moving away from the man who he considers to be Chris’ other father. or, what happens after Eddie drives away at the end of 8x10 because it's all I have been able to think about since I watched the episode.

entry.title: I Don't Love You 'Anyway'
entry.summary:
Author: RhyanneRose

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 865Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: The Buckley Parents are coming to town, and Buck is spiraling—because of course he is. Luckily, Eddie is more than happy to shut that down with a monologue that is absolutely, 100%, guaranteed not romantic in any way. It definitely doesn't read like a love confession. It's a platonic love confession, that's it. Just one dude telling another how much he loves him. Platonically. Obviously.(Buck and Eddie aren't in a romantic relationship yet in this fic, it's just... another little stepping stone for them. That's how I see it, anyway. Because yes. Yes, they are very much in love with each other in this fic. Totally self-indulgent because I hate that Buck thinks he needs to be loved 'anyway'.)

entry.title: Please Step Away From The Edge
entry.summary:
Author: James_Madison_617

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,420Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 72

Summary: The 118 is called to assist in a situation with a jumper. Buck is the first to volunteer to try to talk the person down, his history of suicidal ideation coming back to him as he made his way up to the roof only to see a kid no older than fifteen standing on the railing, leaning over the edge
